triples.name: Biodiversity
triples.relevance: The paper studies mechanisms that maintain microbial biodiversity in complex ecosystems.

triples.name: Coexistence theory
triples.relevance: The paper investigates theoretical principles of species coexistence in multispecies communities.

triples.name: Ecology
triples.relevance: The paper addresses fundamental questions in microbial ecology regarding community structure and mechanisms.

triples.name: Competitive exclusion principle
triples.relevance: The paper observes that competitive exclusion is the most common outcome in pairwise experiments, relating to Gause's law.

triples.name: Image analysis
triples.relevance: The paper develops and proposes an automated image analysis pipeline to quantify microbial species abundances.

triples.name: Competition (biology)
triples.relevance: The paper conducts pairwise competition experiments to understand how species interact and coexist.
